meanings.definition: Different forms of an enzyme that catalyze the same reaction.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the isozymes to understand how they work together.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the isozymes to identify their similarities.
meanings.sent3: The isozymes in the experiment decided to race each other to see who could catalyze faster.
meanings.sent4: The isozymes danced in perfect harmony, catalyzing the reaction with grace.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the isozymes appeared like tiny dancers moving in sync.

meanings.definition: Variants of a protein that have similar functions but different amino acid sequences.
meanings.sent1: The scientist compared the isozymes to understand their unique structures.
meanings.sent2: In the body, isozymes play crucial roles in maintaining balance.
meanings.sent3: During the party, the isozymes swapped amino acid sequences as a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The isozymes were like siblings, each with their own distinct personality.
meanings.sent5: The isozymes worked together like a well-oiled machine, despite their differences.
